title: Drawing, "Peruses Transforms Phinaeus into Stone"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on verso: Perseo cangia in sasso Fineo; on recto: Al Cittadino Felice Giani Pittore in Faenza, oppure al Caffe del Pié de Marmo in Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Peruses Transforms Phinaeus into Stone".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1389.
